name: Looper
plugin_instructions:
♾ Client Loop
1. Paste "Client Loop" element on the page.
2. Fill out the "Count" and "Delay" properties.
3. Now you have access to "Step" state, and "Incremented" event in the workflow tab.
4. Enjoy using it ;)

♾ Workflow Loop
1. Paste "Workflow Loop" element on the page.
2. Trigger "Start" on the "Workflow Loop" element.
3. Add an event listener "When Workflow Loop Run Next" and create your workflow.
4. Trigger "Run Next" as a last step in the created workflow.
5. Enjoy using it ;)
